channel.title: Weapon types?
channel.description:
hay guys,
im in a spot of bother. how to i change the attack type of a weapon. for example say i added a custom maul, and it hits like a sword how can i change the type of attack to "pummle, crush ect......".
king regards
The Tormented
*please anyone?*
